podcasts.title: Transmission
podcasts.description: Weekly deep dives into the stories behind the music, featuring interviews with artists, producers, and industry insiders.

episodes.title: The Evolution of Midwest Emo
episodes.description: We trace the roots of midwest emo from Champaign basements to sold-out shows across the country.

episodes.title: DIY Venues: Past, Present, Future
episodes.description: The history and future of DIY spaces in Chicago with venue owners and organizers.

episodes.title: Behind the Board: Legendary Producers
episodes.description: Conversations with the producers shaping the sound of indie music.

podcasts.title: Local Frequency
podcasts.description: Spotlighting Chicago's vibrant local music scene, one artist at a time.

episodes.title: Ratboys: Growing Up in Public
episodes.description: Julia Steiner and Dave Sagan talk about their journey from house shows to international tours.

episodes.title: Divino Niño's Sound Evolution
episodes.description: How this Chicago band blends psychedelic rock with Latin influences.

episodes.title: The Hecks: Punk Energy Meets Pop Hooks
episodes.description: Dissecting the raw energy and melodic sensibility of one of Chicago's best punk bands.

podcasts.title: Crate Diggers
podcasts.description: CHIRP DJs share the stories behind their favorite records and deep cuts.

episodes.title: Morning Mike's Guilty Pleasures
episodes.description: The records Morning Mike won't admit he loves (but totally does).

episodes.title: Rush Hour Ryan's Commute Classics
episodes.description: The perfect records for Chicago traffic.

episodes.title: Night Owl Nina's After Dark Selections
episodes.description: The moody, atmospheric records that soundtrack the late night.

podcasts.title: The CHIRP Record Club
podcasts.description: Each month, we pick an album and discuss it in depth with special guests and listeners.

episodes.title: OK Computer at 27
episodes.description: Revisiting Radiohead's landmark album and its lasting influence.

episodes.title: In the Aeroplane Over the Sea
episodes.description: The cult classic that launched a thousand indie bands.

episodes.title: Funeral by Arcade Fire
episodes.description: How this debut album changed indie rock forever.
